Package com.example.eventlottery.Models

package com.example.eventlottery.Models
  • Related Packages

  • Class
    Description
    EventModel
    Event Model This class represent an event where user can join/unjoin to the waitlist, and be selected by a lottery system so they can enroll in the event Also this class has all the information of the event, it include it deadlines, if geolocation is available or not It also contains the facility that the event belong
    EventsArrayAdapter
    Events Array Adapter This class is an adapter that manage the listview of events to configure the view of the elements on the listview in a specific way
    FacilityArrayAdapter
    Adapter of a array of FacilityModel objects This class is an adapter the manage an array of FacilityModel objects to be show in a specific way in a listview
    FacilityModel
    Facility Model This class represent a Facility where events can be created by the organizer, this Facility has details about the facility, an owner (userID), the purpose of this class is to have a representation of a place where the event can take place
    RemoteUserRef
    This class is the RemoteUserRef The purpose of this class is to make a small version of the UserModel, so the essential information of the User can be send to the Firebase, so the organizer can have the important information of the entrants, also it save the geolocation of the user to store in the firebase when the user join an event that required
    RemoteUserRef.UserObserver
     
    UserArrayAdapter
    Adapter of a array of UserModel objects This class is an adapter the manage an array of UserModel objects to be show in a specific way in a listview
    UserModel
    This Class stores the current user's information This class represent a User on the app, it contains all the information of the user, it name, phone, email, profile picture and if the user has a facility where they can make events, it also check if the user has notification on/off This class provides setter and getter for the attributes of this class
